val.desc: The actual value of the option with which model value is changed

label.desc: Label to display along the radio control (or use the default slot instead of this prop)

left-label.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the checkbox

keep-color.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when checkbox is unticked?

default.desc: Default slot can be used as label, unless 'label' prop is specified; Suggestion: string

set.desc: Sets the Radio's v-model to equal the val
